text: My Darkest Days is a Canadian rock band from Norwood, Ontario. My Darkest Days has five members in the band; the current band members are Matt Walst, Sal Costa, Brendan McMillan, Doug Oliver, and Reid Henry. The band was formed in 2006 by lead singer Matt Walst. They released their self-titled debut album "My Darkest Days" on September 21, 2010. They are currently signed to 604 Records. They released their second studio album "Sick and Twisted Affair" on March 26, 2012. == Band members == ;Current *Matt Walst – lead vocals, rhythm guitar *Sal Costa – lead guitar, vocals *Brendan McMillan – bass guitar *Doug Oliver – drums, percussion *Reid Henry – keyboards ;Former *Paulo Neta – lead guitar *Chris MacMillan - lead guitar == Discography == ===Albums=== So far as of 2012, My Darkest Days have released 2 Studio album: *My Darkest Days (2010) *Sick and Twisted Affair (2012) ===Singles=== *Porn Star Dancing (2010) (featuring Zakk Wylde & Chad Kroeger) *Move Your Body (2011) *Every Lie (2011) *Casual Sex (2012) *Sick and Twisted Affair (2012) == Other websites == *My Darkest Days' Official website Category:2000s music groups Category:2010s music groups Category:Canadian rock bands Category:Canadian hard rock bands Category:Post-grunge bands Category:2005 establishments in Canada
title: My Darkest Days
